message: Hi Bob, I have an excellent product that I'm sure you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you at a competitive price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. Considering the value of the product, the lowest I can go is $1800000. I hope we can agree on this.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I'm still very interested in the product, but $1800000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay. I'd like to make another counteroffer.
